text: @realDonaldTrump You didn't close the border because of the coronavirus. You cut funding to the CDC by 15% & are now trying to limit what information gets out to the public. You should be honest about what's happening.  Instead you bitch about the market and Dems. You're inept as president.

entity.name: President Trump puts VP Pence in charge of US response to coronavirus
entity.description: Donald Trump said the risk to the US from the deadly coronavirus “remains very low” and that he has put Vice President Mike Pence in charge of the American response to the outbreak.
